name: Puzzles for smart: Dogs
description: A fairly simple, educational game. Assemble the puzzle of dogs from certain parts of the picture. The game of puzzles will seem to your child very fascinating as he will gradually achieve that he wants to see...
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP and newer Processor: Athlon 2 X3 450 Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: GeForce EN9600 GT Storage: 150 MB available space
